features: 🐈【Soft & Excellent Adsorption Bristles】Four layers of soft bristles have excellent adsorption capacity, which can easily absorb hair, dust and fine particles on the ground, avoiding dust floating in the air during the sweeping process. And, the dustpan is designed to conform to the ground, so you can easily sweep the dust into the dustpan, rather than sweeping under the dustpan. Makes your entire cleaning process very easy and fast.

🐕【Built-in Cleaning Tooth Comb】There is a row of cleaning tooth combs on the dustpan. When your broom is full of hair and dust, you don't need to fiddle with the broom with your hands, just scrape from bottom to top on the tooth comb, and you can easily scrape the hair and dust on the broom wire into the dustpan. The humanized design can effectively prevent you from getting your hands dirty, making the whole cleaning process more convenient and simple.

🍂【Flexible 180° Rotating Broom Head】The broom head can be flexibly rotated 180°, so that you can easily clean to the bottom of the sofa, the bottom of the coffee table, the bottom of the bed, etc, without missing any corner of the home, so that the cleaning process of low spaces is no longer difficult, and your house will look brand new.

🏢【Stainless Steel Long Handle】The total length of the broom is 120cm (47.24inch), and the total length of the dustpan is 105.5cm (41.53inch). The broom and dustpan set is long enough so that you don't need to bend your knees and bend over during the cleaning process, effectively avoiding your back pain. In addition, there is a ring on the top of the broom, you can hang the broom on the wall when not in use, effectively reducing the floor space and making your home more tidy.

🏡【Easy Storage Vertical Dustpan】Large-capacity dustpan design can accommodate more garbage at one time. When not in use, the dustpan can stand upright and is less than 5 inches wide, making it ideal for fitting in gaps between furniture and walls without taking up too much space. This is a broom and dustpan set that combines practicality and beauty. If you have any questions about the product, please contact us in time, we will provide you with the perfect solution within 24 hours.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Previous page Next page 1 Broom and Dustpan Set 2 Soft Adsorption Bristles 3 Built Cleaning Tooth Comb 4 180° Rotating Broom Head 5 Large capacity dustpan
Upright Standing Dustpan and Broom Combo

Broom and Dustpan Set Product Details: Color: Blue+ Yellow+ WhiteMaterial: Stainless steel, PP, PETSize:Broom: 120*26cm (47.24*10.23inch)/Dustpan: 10*27.5*105.5cm (3.93*10.82*41.53inch)Package Include:3* Broom Handle/1* Broom Head/3* Dustpan Handle/1* Dustpan

Rubber Lip The front end of the dustpan has a rubber lip, which makes the dustpan close to the ground, and you can easily sweep the dust into the dustpan. Stainless Steel Handle The handle is made of three sections of high-quality stainless steel rods, with a total length of 120 cm (47.24 inches). Upright Dustpan You can hold the dustpan upright when the broom and dustpan set is not in use. In the upright state, the dustpan has a width of less than 5 inches. Comes with Hanging Ring There is a ring on the top of the broom, which can be hung on the wall when not in use, effectively reducing the floor space.

Broom Dustpan Set-Say goodbye to the messy ground Other broom dustpan sets The traditional broom and dustpan set is not only small in size, but also needs to bend over when cleaning, which is inefficient and prone to back pain. At the same time, the ability to absorb garbage is poor, and it needs to be cleaning several times. Our Improved Broom Dustpan Set This broom is 48in long, suitable for everyone, no need to bend over to clean, protect your back, and the large-capacity dustpan can stand upright, saving space. The broom has strong adsorption capacity, high cleaning efficiency, and is a good helper for housework!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 12, 2024
Reviewed in the United States on January 5, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This was so easy to put together and it is easy to store also.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 8, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 2.0 out of 5 stars Flimsy and already broke!
reviews.reviewText: I had a bad feeling when the broom had to be assembled in multiple parts. I wouldn’t say I’m hard on a broom but when I’m sweeping I don’t want to have to worry about how the joints of the broom stick are holding up. The handles come right off all the time the joints come apart I’ve never used the squeegee and it doesn’t hook on the dustpan so it’s just sat in the closet. The broom is so soft sweeping with it seems like you have to do more to get the same result of a good broom. The dustpan has no rubber strip to really get a good seal so you can sweep in the dust pan but it still goes under it. If you had a room no one ever entered and you just needed to use this on a rare occasion it’ll probably hold up fine but we’re a small farm with children and pets and it didn’t last long here. The broom fell out of the housing and won’t stay in so I came on to order another (different) broom and felt like maybe I can save someone else the trouble by leaving a review.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 7, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Falls apart on use
reviews.reviewText: Will NOT stay connected. Every time I use it it completely comes apart. I’ve put this back together at least 50 times. Terrible product don’t waste your money.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 29, 2023
Reviewed in the United States on March 13, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Cheaply made. not what I expected.
reviews.reviewText: Great idea behind the product, but not executed at a 100%. Still all right, and my kids using it fine, but hinge does not hold anymore, the metal on it got bent first day of use. and overall cheaply made product.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 12, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great for short users
reviews.reviewText: Handle is to short for tall folks. I'm 5'2" and it is fine. My friend is 6'1" and complained the broom is to short

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 16, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Worth the Splurge
reviews.reviewText: I really questioned ordering a broom. I like it's finer bristles so it barely stirs up dust while using. The dust pan's edge works well and it having a handle and a comb to remove hair is a bonus. Dust pan handle pieces can be added to extend broom length to easily remove occasional spider webs from a high ceiling. Broom accesses narrow and hard to reach areas in a small home. Replaces my former use of dusty swivel sweepers.

reviews.reviewTitle: Item not as per specifications shown
reviews.reviewText: Delivered item was not as per the specification shown. Length of handle was less. One piece of handle was missing in two of the items and the top piece for the hook was not fitting.
